sentence.text: We performed a quantitative proteomics study of EOC patient tumor tissues and identified changes in expression of several key regulators of actin cytoskeleton/cell adhesion and cell migration (CAPN1, 14-3-3, extracellular matrix disassembly, PFN1, mitotic cytokinesis, CFN1) associated with loss of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination function.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: By immunohistochemistry of ovarian tumors with double-strand break repair via homologous recombination(+/+) and BRCA1(null) status, we further verified our proteomic-based finding of elevated negative regulation of actin filament polymerization expression associated with BRCA1 deficiency.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
negative regulation of actin filament polymerization

sentence.text: Finally, we established a causal link between negative regulation of actin filament polymerization and double-strand break repair via homologous recombination-induced changes in cell migration thus uncovering a novel mechanistic basis for BRCA1-dependent regulation of ovarian cancer cell migration.

entity.text: negative regulation of actin filament polymerization
double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
